title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Clearly define the scope, objectives, and requirements for the EthicalOracleAI project, including the ethical frameworks to be considered (e.g., deontological, consequentialist, virtue ethics), the types of moral dilemmas to be addressed (e.g., bioethics, environmental ethics, social justice), the expected functionality (e.g., natural language processing, knowledge base, reasoning engine), and the user interface (e.g., web-based, mobile app, conversational AI).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for EthicalOracleAI, including the AI model, data processing pipeline, user interface, integration with external data sources and ethical frameworks, as well as considerations for scalability, security, maintainability, and ethical implications.

title: Develop AI Model
description: Develop the AI model for EthicalOracleAI, capable of analyzing complex moral dilemmas and providing impartial ethical guidance based on multiple philosophical frameworks.

title: Implement Data Processing Pipeline
description: Implement the data processing pipeline for EthicalOracleAI, including data ingestion, preprocessing, and integration with external data sources and ethical frameworks.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Develop the user interface for EthicalOracleAI, allowing users to input moral dilemmas and receive ethical guidance from the AI model.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to ensure the privacy and integrity of user data and the ethical guidance provided by EthicalOracleAI.

title: Develop Testing Strategy
description: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy for EthicalOracleAI, including unit tests, integration tests, end-to-end tests, ethical scenario tests, and performance tests, to ensure the system's reliability, accuracy, ethical decision-making capabilities, and scalability.

title: Prepare Deployment and DevOps
description: Prepare the deployment and DevOps processes for EthicalOracleAI, including infrastructure setup, continuous integration and delivery, monitoring, logging, and security considerations. Ensure high availability, scalability, and disaster recovery mechanisms are in place.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Write comprehensive technical documentation for EthicalOracleAI, including system architecture, API documentation, and deployment and maintenance guides.
